original: Each siege phase the attacker has a chance to breach the walls. Breaching the walls gives a $BREACHBONUS|=+$ bonus to siege roll.
translation: 每个围攻阶段进攻方都有机会攻破城墙，城墙破裂在围城时会给予 $BREACHBONUS|=+$ 的加成。

original:
#t Siege Phase Outcome#!
Each time a siege phase happens a die ($MIN|Y$ to $MAX|Y$) is rolled. That roll is then added together with the siege modifiers ($MODIFIERS|+=$). On a natural roll of 1, the attackers will suffer a Disease Outbreak that reduces their numbers by $VAL|R%$ of their maximum strength.

The results of the roll are as follows:
translation:
#t 围攻阶段结果#!
每个围攻阶段将会掷出（$MIN|Y$ 到 $MAX|Y$）骰子。掷出的点数将与围攻修正（$MODIFIERS|+=$）加总。如果投出1点，攻城方将遭受疾病爆发的影响导致减员最大人数的 $VAL|R%$。

这次掷骰的结果如下：

original: This siege has been going on for $TOTAL|Y$ days. The next siege phase is in $LEFT|Y$ days.
translation: 这场围攻已经持续了 $TOTAL|Y$ 天。$LEFT|Y$ 天后开始下一个围城阶段。

original:
#T Siege Phase Timer#!
The next siege phase is in $VAL|Y$ day(s).
The length of a siege phase of $SIZE|Y$ is due to:
$WHY$
translation:
#T 围攻阶段计时#!
下一个围攻阶段将在 $VAL|Y$ 天后。
一个围攻阶段的长度为 $SIZE|Y$ ，基于：
$WHY$

original: #T Last Dice Roll#!\nThis was the the dice roll when the last time the siege ticked.
translation: #T 最终掷骰#!\n这是最后一次围攻事件的掷骰子。

original: #T Siege Accumulation#!\nThis the accumulated status of the siege.
translation: #T 围攻累积#!\n这是围攻的累积状态。

original: #T Commander Impact#!\nMartial ability of the commander can impact this by by #G +1#! for each #Y 5#! Martial.
translation: #T 指挥官影响#!\n指挥官的每#Y 5#!点军略能力可以给予围攻#G +1#!修正。

original: #T Blockade#!\nIf this is a port, and it is not blockaded, then there is a #R -1 #! to the siege progress.
translation: #T 封锁#!\n如果这是一个港口且没有被封锁，那么将会获得#R -1#!围攻修正。

original: #T Fortifications#!\nEach level of fortifications in a city will add #R -1 #! to the siege progress.
translation: #T 防御工事#!\n一座城市的每级防御工事都将给予#R -1#!围攻修正。

original: #T Siege Engineering#!\nThe ability of sieging of the besieging country.
translation: #T 围城工程#!\n正在进行围攻的国家的围城能力

original: #T Breaches#!\nThe amount of times the walls have been breached in this siege. When the wall is breached, it is far easier to assault.
translation: #T 破裂#!\n城墙在这次围攻中被攻破的次数。当城墙被攻破时，攻击就容易多了。

original:
#T Fort Defense#!
The fort defense is modified by $VAL|+=%$ due to:
$WHY$

#TF This impact how long it is between siege phases. A positive value makes a siege last longer.#!
translation:
#T 要塞防御#!
要塞防御修正为 $VAL|+=%$ 原因是：
$WHY$

#TF 这影响了围攻阶段之间时间的长短。该值与围攻时长正相关。#!

original:
#T Fort Defense#!
The fort defense is modified by $VAL|-=%$ due to:
$WHY$

#TF This impact how long it is between siege phases. A positive value makes a siege last longer.#!
translation:
#T 要塞防御#!
要塞防御修正为 $VAL|-=%$ 原因是：
$WHY$

#TF 这影响了围攻阶段之间时间的长短。该值与围攻时长正相关。#!
@trigger_no!该大队已经失去了战斗能力\n

original:
Attacking $NAME$($TYPE|Y$), killing $STR|G$ @manpower!, and inflicting $MOR|G$ @morale! morale damage.

This is due to the following:
$WHY$
translation:
攻击$NAME$（$TYPE|Y$），击杀 $STR|G$ @manpower!，且造成 $MOR|G$ @morale!士气伤害。

基于以下原因：
$WHY$

original:
Base Damage: $VAL|Y$

#TF All modifiers below are multiplied immediately on the damage value.#!
translation:
基础伤害：$VAL|Y$

#TF 以下所有修正会直接作用于伤害值。#!

original: #T Regular Cohort#!\nThis is a normal type of cohort with no special abilities.
translation: #T 普通大队#!\n这种大队没有任何特殊能力。

original: #T Mercenary Cohort#!\nThis is a mercenary cohort, which will only accept to be lead by its general, and can not be assigned to other armies.
translation: #T 雇佣军大队#!\n这是雇佣军，它只会接受他自己将领的领导，并且无法被指派给其他军队。

original: #T Migrant Cohort#!\nThis is a cohort composed of migrants. They will fight like regular units, but can also be settled, creating a tribesmen Pop of your culture and religion in the current location.
translation: #T 移民大队#!\n这种大队是有移民组成的。他们可以像普通大队一样战斗，但也可以进行定居，这会在当前省份创建一个拥有你的文化和宗教的人口。

original: #T Clan Retinue#!\nThis is a cohort that has been raised by a clan leader. They will take care of reinforcement and cover some of the maintenance costs, but they will be disbanded at the death of the clan leader.
translation: #T 氏族亲兵#!\n这支大队是由氏族首领招募的亲兵。他们的增援及维护费用由氏族自行承担，不过一旦氏族首领死亡他们将会直接被解散。

original: The Max Morale of $VAL|Y$ depends on:\nBase: $BASE|G2$\n
translation: 最大士气 $VAL|Y$ 基于：\n基础值：$BASE|G2$\n

original: @trigger_no!Can not change while unit is in combat.
@trigger_no!Can not change while leader is disloyal.

#T Primary Cohorts#!
This is the type of cohort that will be first to engage the enemy.
Currently, we have selected $NAME|Y$.
$WHY$
translation:
#T 第一队列#!
这是最先与敌人交战的队列。
当前我们已选择$NAME|Y$。
$WHY$

original:
#T Secondary Cohorts#!
This is the type of cohort that will be in the second row, and will engage the enemy after the primary cohorts have fled or been destroyed.
Currently, we have selected $NAME|Y$.
$WHY$
translation:
#T 第二队列#!
该队列将在我方第一队列逃跑或被摧毁之后顶替他们加入战斗。
当前我们已选择$NAME|Y$。
$WHY$

original:
#T Flanking Cohorts#!
This is the type of cohort that will be placed on the flanks of our army, to encircle and cut down the enemy.
Currently, we have selected $NAME|Y$.
$WHY$
translation:
#T 侧翼队列#!
这是我们军队的侧翼，负责包抄和切断敌军。
当前我们已选择$NAME|Y$。
$WHY$

original: #T Preferred Size of Flank#!\nThis is the amount of cohorts this army will attempt to place on the flanks.\nClick to change flank size to $NEXT|Y$ cohorts.
translation: #T 侧翼规模#!\n这是这支军队能够在侧翼部署大队的数量，前提是这支部队足够大且包含了侧翼部队。\n点击以更改 $NEXT|Y$ 大队的规模。

original:
#T Current Morale#!
The Morale is $CURR|Y2$ out of $MAX|Y2$

#TF Only the cohorts currently on the front line is considered. Those in reserve or those that have already fled is not taken into account.#!
translation:
#T 当前士气#!
当前士气为 $CURR|Y2$ / $MAX|Y2$

#TF 士气由只在前线的大队计算得来。预备队及已经溃败的大队不会加入统计。#!

original: #T Current Morale#!\nThe Morale is $CURR|Y2$ out of $MAX|Y2$
translation: #T 当前士气#!\n士气为 $CURR|Y2$，最大值为 $MAX|Y2$

original: Morale recovers by $VAL$ each month outside of combat due to:\n$WHY$
translation: 在没有战斗时每月士气恢复 $VAL$，基于：\n$WHY$

original: #T Unit Visible#!\nThis unit is currently visible to hostile AI.
translation: #T 可见部队#!\n此部队目前对敌对AI可见。

original: #T Unit Visible#!\nHostile AI have a $CHANCE$ percent chance to forget about this unit each day.
translation: #T 可见部队#!\n敌对AI每天有 $CHANCE$% 的机会忘记此部队。

original: #T Unit is Invisible#!\nThis unit is within Fog of War and invisible to hostile AI.
translation: #T 不可见部队#!\n此部队处于战争迷雾中，对于敌对AI不可见。

original: This button will close the current troop window
translation: 此按钮将关闭当前的部队窗口

original: The selected units cannot be merged:\n$WHY$
$NAME|Y$ is currently moving to another province
Units are currently retreating while others are not ($FROM|Y$ and $TO|Y$)
translation: 部队目前正在撤退，而其他部队则没有撤退（从$FROM|Y$到$TO|Y$）

original: The clan chief is refusing to give up $NAME|Y$
The mercenaries $NAME|Y$ cannot be merged with other units
translation: 雇佣兵$NAME|Y$不能和其他单位合并

original: Navies and Armies cannot be merged ($FROM|Y$ and $TO|Y$)
translation: 海军和陆军不能合并（$FROM|Y$和$TO|Y$）

original: $FROM|Y$ AND $TO|Y$ are assigned to different governors
#T Select Unit Objective#!\nUnits can be assigned various objectives, which they will try to fulfill without direct player interaction. \n#I Click to select an unit objective!#!
translation: #T 选择部队目标#!\n可以给部队指定各种目标，他们将努力完成目标，无需玩家的直接互动。\n#I 点击选择一项部队目标！#!

original: #T $OBJ$#!\n$DESC$\n#I Click to select another unit objective!#!
translation: #T $OBJ$#!\n$DESC$\n#I 点击选择另一项部队目标！#!

original: The selected units are currently following two or more different objectives.
translation: 当前选中的单位正在执行两个或以上目标。

original: Choosing the merge option will take the current selected units and convert them into a single unit.
translation: 选择合并选项将把目前所选的数个部队转换为一个部队。

original: You can only reorganize when 2 units are selected.
translation: 你只能在选择了 2 个部队时整编。

original: Reorganizing these two units will allow you move cohorts between the two army
translation: 整编这两个部队将允许你在这两个部队之间移动大队。

original: Clicking here will transfer the cohort from the current army to the other one.
translation: 点击此处将把大队从当前部队转移至另一个部队。

original: Maximum of #Y $VALUE$#!  percent in this location.
#T Number of $NAME$#!\nYou have a total of $VAL|Y$ $NAME$.
#T Number of $NAME$ Cohorts#!\nYou have a total amount of $VAL|Y$ $NAME$ cohorts.
#T Number of $NAME$ Ships#!\nYou have a total of $VAL|Y$ $NAME$.
#T Number of $NAME$#!\nThere is a total amount of $VAL|Y$ $NAME$ in this army.
translation: #T $NAME$数量#!\n你在当前军队中总共拥有 $VAL|Y$ $NAME$。

original: #T Number of $NAME$ Cohorts#!\nThere is a total amount of $VAL|Y$ $NAME$ cohorts in this army.
translation: #T $NAME$大队数量#!\n当前军队中共有 $VAL|Y$ $NAME$大队。

original: #T Number of $NAME$ Ships#!\nThere is a total amount of $VAL|Y$ $NAME$ in this fleet.
translation: #T $NAME$船只数量#!\n这是该舰队内的$VAL|Y$$NAME$总数。

original: #T Location#!\nThis unit is currently at this location.
translation: #T 位置#!\n该部队的当前位置。

original: #T Toggle Unit Types#!\nCurrently only showing the types of units this unit consists of.\n#I Click to show all types.#!
translation: #T 切换兵种#!\n目前只显示这个部队包括的兵种。\n#I 点击以显示所有兵种。#!

original: #T Toggle Unit Types#!\nCurrently showing all the possible types of units this unit could have.\n#I Click to show only current ones.#!
translation: #T 切换兵种#!\n目前显示这个部队可以包括的所有兵种。\n#I 点击仅显示当前兵种。#!

original: #T Toggle Unit Types#!\nCurrently showing all the possible types of units an army have.\n#I Click to show only those capable of assaulting fortifications.#!
translation: #T 切换兵种#!\n目前显示这个部队包括的所有可用兵种。\n#I 点击以只显示能够攻击防御工事的兵种。#!

original: #T Toggle Unit Types#!\nCurrently showing only the types of units that could assault fortifications.\n#I Click to show all types!#!
translation: #T 切换兵种#!\n目前只显示可以攻击防御工事的兵种。\n#I 点击以显示所有兵种。#!

original: This unit has a total blockade contribution of $PERCENT|0Y%$ spread across $CITIES|Y$ cities.
translation: 该部队总共对 $CITIES|Y$ 个城市的封锁作出 $PERCENT|0Y%$ 的贡献。

original: #T Total Strength #!\nThis is the total amount of men we have in our $NUM|Y$ cohorts.
translation: #T 总兵力#!\n这是我们 $NUM|Y$ 个大队的士兵总数。

original: #T Total Strength #!\nThis is the amount of ships this fleet has.
translation: #T 总实力#!\n这是该舰队拥有的船只总数。

original: This unit is in the process of merging into another unit.
translation: 当前单位正在与另一个单位合并。
忠诚度所带来的训练度提升：$VAL|+2%$\n

original: Breach! With a breach in the walls the besieging armies have a much better chance of storming this fortification!
translation: 城墙破裂！随着城墙破裂，围攻部队破坏城防更容易了！

original: With your current Army composition, $NAME$ has an Effectiveness of $EFFECTIVENESS|Y%$, which results in:\n
translation: 基于你当前的兵种组成，$NAME$的效果为$EFFECTIVENESS|Y%$，将会导致以下：\n

original:
#T Tactic Effectiveness#!
With your current Army composition, $NAME$ has an Effectiveness of $EFFECTIVENESS|Y%$. This will affect how strong $NAME$ is versus other Tactics.

The Effectiveness factor for the different Cohort Types for this Tactic is:
translation:
#T 战术效果#!
由于你当前的兵种组成，$NAME$的战术效果为$EFFECTIVENESS|Y%$。这会影响$NAME$针对其他战术的强度。

不同大队类型对该战术效果的影响为：

original: #t $TYPE$ Tactic Effectiveness#!\nThe $TYPE|Y$ provide $EFFECTIVENESS|+=0%$ Tactic Effectiveness to this tactic.\nThis is because $TYPE$ have an $EFFECT|+=0%$ Effectiveness factor with this tactic, and you have $NUM|Y0$ $TYPE$ of a total of $TOTAL|Y0$ Cohorts.
translation: #t $TYPE$ 战术效果#!\n这一$TYPE|Y$为这个战术提供$EFFECTIVENESS|+=0%$ 战术效果。\n这是由于$TYPE$对这个战术有$EFFECT|+=0%$的加成系数，而且你在总计 $TOTAL|Y0$ 大队中拥有 $NUM|Y0$ $TYPE$。

original: $TACTIC|Y$ has a $POWER|+=0%$ strength versus $OTHER|Y$.\nThis is modified by your composition($COMPOSITION|Y%$) for a final $RESULT|+=1%$.
translation: $TACTIC|Y$对$OTHER|Y$有$POWER|+=0%$的优势。\n这一修正是源于你的军队构成（$COMPOSITION|Y%$），修正为$RESULT|+=1%$。

original: #t [CombatTactic.GetName]#!\n[SelectTactic.GetTactic.GetName] would deal [SelectTactic.GetTactic.GetPowerVersusDiffWithEfficiency(CombatTactic.GetCombatTactic,SelectTactic.GetUnit)|+=0%] Damage against an Army using [CombatTactic.GetName].
translation: #t [CombatTactic.GetName]#!\n[SelectTactic.GetTactic.GetName]对一支陆军使用[CombatTactic.GetName]会造成[SelectTactic.GetTactic.GetPowerVersusDiffWithEfficiency(CombatTactic.GetCombatTactic,SelectTactic.GetUnit)|+=0%]伤害。

original: $TACTIC|Y$ has no advantage or disadvantage over $OTHER|Y$.
Die roll for this side in this phase.
translation: 现阶段该军队的骰子结果。

original: Relative modifier from martial value of commanding leader compared to the opponent's commanding leader.
translation: 我军将领与敌军将领军略能力的差距影响。

original: River-crossing or landing on beach penalty on attacker.
translation: 进攻方渡河与登陆惩罚。

original:
#T Positioning#!

Positioning affects how good ships are at selecting their targets. Ships in a poorly positioned fleet can sometimes miss an opportunity to attack. At very low values ships can even accidentally attack friendly targets.

Positioning depends on you admiral martial skill level and a random factor. Fleets regain positioning each day up to a certain level.
translation:
#T 阵型#!

阵型影响着船只选择作战目标的能力。如果一只舰队的阵型较差，那么舰队内的船只将错失攻击对手的机会，而极差的阵营甚至会导致舰船误伤到友军。

阵型取决于你的海军将领的军略技能等级，以及其他一些随机因素。舰队每天能够恢复阵型值直到某个特定的等级。

original: A #Y $TYPE$#!  will be fielded here on #Y $DATE$#! .
translation: 一支#Y $TYPE$#! 将于 #Y $DATE$#! 从此处派往战场。

original: A #Y $TYPE$#!  will be put to sea here on #Y $DATE$#! .
translation: 一支#Y $TYPE$#! 将于 #Y $DATE$#! 在此处启航。

original: A #Y $BUILDING$#!  will be finished here on #Y $DATE$#! .
translation: 一栋#Y $BUILDING$#! 将与 #Y $DATE$#! 在此处完工。

original: A #Y $TYPE$#!  will be fielded in #Y $LOCATION$#! on #Y $DATE$#! .
translation: 一支#Y $TYPE$#! 将于 #Y $DATE$#! 从#Y $LOCATION$#!派往战场。

original: A #Y $TYPE$#!  will be put to sea in #Y $LOCATION$#! on #Y $DATE$#! .
translation: 一支#Y $TYPE$#! 将于 #Y $DATE$#! 在 #Y $LOCATION$#! 启航。

original: A #Y $BUILDING$#!  will be finished in #Y $LOCATION$#! on #Y $DATE$#! .
translation: 一栋#Y $BUILDING$#! 将于 #Y $DATE$#! 在#Y $LOCATION$#!完工。

original: This port provides a safe haven for ships.
translation: 这个港口为船只提供了避风港。

original: Relative modifier from MARTIAL value of commanding leader compared to the opponent's commanding leader.
translation: 我军将领与敌军将领军略能力的差距影响。

original: Units stay behind and unless superior avoid the enemy.
translation: 部队将会留在后方，除非形势占优否则避免战斗。

original: Units defend and if necessary retake your territory.
translation: 部队守卫国土，必要时重新夺回你的领土。

original: Units attack rebel armies and besiege rebel held territory.
translation: 部队攻击叛军，并围攻叛军占领的领土。

original: Units act independently out of their volition.
translation: 部队自主决断独立行事。

original: Units sweep for and report enemy movements in the vicinity.
translation: 部队搜寻并报告附近的敌军行动。

original: Transport armies that have been set to do naval landings.
translation: 运输将要进行登陆作战的部队。

original: Search and destroy enemy fleets within our naval range.
translation: 搜索并摧毁我们海军范围内的敌军舰队。

original: Blockade hostile controlled coasts, splitting as necessary.
translation: 封锁敌方控制的海岸，必要时舰队会分离。

original: This leader is disloyal and pursues his own agenda.
translation: 这名将领不忠诚，他决定自行其事。
配备轻型的武器和盔甲

original: Armed with spears, swords, javelins and protected by large shields
translation: 配有矛、剑、几只标枪和一面大盾牌

original: Well aimed javelin can pierce even heavy armour or thick elephant hide
translation: 投射精准的标枪可以刺穿厚重的盔甲或厚实的大象皮

original: Stone and lead bullets will put a fear into a heart of any enemy
translation: 包铅的石弹会将恐惧烙印在敌人心中

original: Camel riders often fight with spear and bow, and are adept at maneuvering in harsh environments.
translation: 骆驼骑手经常用矛和弓打仗，适合派遣到恶劣干旱环境中作战。

original: With good armor and weapons these troops formed the backbone of the Mediterranean world’s armies. Either forming a base around other units maneuvered or as the main assault option
translation: 这些军队拥有精良的盔甲和武器，能够成为地中海世界军队的中坚力量。他们或作为和其他部队一起行动的基干力量，或用作进攻的主力军

original: First encountered when Alexander the Great invaded India. These fearsome beasts soon became an important part of warfare. Used correctly these units could dominate a battlefield.
translation: 亚历山大大帝入侵印度时第一次遇到。这些可怕的野兽很快成为战争的重要组成部分。正确运用这些部队可以主宰战场。

original: Armed with bow and light armor these units were not very effective on their own. However when deployed in support of heavy infantry they could add extra punch to an infantry assault.
translation: 这些部队装备着弓箭和轻盔甲，本身并不是很有效。然而，当部署以支持重型步兵时，可以额外强化步兵突击。

original: With the wind being an unreliable means of powering a ship alternative solution has to be found. Harnessing the power of oarsmen meant that a ship could travel at a reasonable speed as long as the weather remained calm. In combat the Trireme could either board or ram the enemy.
translation: 由于风太不可靠的，我们必须为我们船舶的动力找到替代方案。利用桨叶的力量，只要天气保持平静，船就能以合适的速度行驶。在战斗中，三层划桨战船可以登陆或打击敌人。
